intro: Celmisia verbascifolia subsp. rigida, commonly known as the rigid fleur-de-lis, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its distinctive, showy yellow flowers that resemble a fleur-de-lis. The plant has narrow, grass-like leaves and grows in rocky or alpine environments. It is a perennial herb that typically reaches heights of up to 30 centimeters. Due to its unique appearance and habitat, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
